notes: Spacious, well-renovated apartment with modern finishes including wood-look flooring, recessed lighting, and contemporary furniture. The open living/dining area is very clean with good natural light from large windows. Kitchen is modern with updated cabinets and appliances. For baby safety, the furniture has some sharp corners on the dining table/bench and metal shelving units that would need attention; no visible stairs or dangerous balcony railings in these images.
